Gosegu

Korean: 고세구

Hometown:

Incheon

Country:

South Korea

Blood type:
B
Group (2021-present):
ISEGYE IDOL

Introduction

Gosegu is a virtual South Korean singer and streamer under WAK Entertainment.

She debuted as a member of the virtual girl group ISEGYE IDOL on December 17, 2021, with their digital single RE:WIND.
